name: Dizzy 3.5 as Nokia 3310
description:
Dizzy 3.5 for NOKIA 3310 JAM 5

Clone of the game Dizzy 3.5 (by Oliver Twins) came from a retro computer Zx Spectrum (1989).

Control:

WASD + Space

The game does not correspond to the theme of the jam, but what's done is done)

Wiki:

While still an official game it was released for free in Crash magazine. Serves as an intro to MagicLand Dizzy. With only 5 screens, it's the smallest game in the series
